en.title: FusionExcel Welcomes Arnel Ignacio, Top Filipino TV Host, Actor and Comedian!
en.content:
FE Leader & Director Dr Anarie Reye, Arnel Ignacio and Jeremy Looi.
Arnell Ignacio is a well known Filipino game show host, comedian and actor. Arnell has hosted shows like Chibugan Na, Kwarta o Kahon, Go Bingo, Katok mga Misis, and K, The P1-Million Videoke Challenge. He also guest judged for Kakaibang Idol, a special edition of Philippine Idol which was held for contestants with the most notable auditions. Arnell returned to his TV game show, "GoBingo" after 9 years of hiatus.

Ignacio won as Best Talent Show Hosts together with Lucy Torres-Gomez & Dominic Ochoa at the 2008 PMPC Star Awards for TV. He's now part of "Daisy Siyete Season 22: Kambalilong" together with Sex Bomb Girls. He also hosts "Si Susan Na, si Arnell Pa!" on Super Radyo DZBB, together with Susan Enriquez.
